definition: Lorentz (name)/Hendrik Lorentz (1853-1928), Dutch physicist, 1902 Nobel laureate
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)

sentences.english: Walter Lorenz recommends that all instruments be regularly inspected for wear and disfigurement.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾特洛倫茨外科公司建議定期檢查磨損和缺陷情況。

sentences.english: Certainly, Lorenz's theory has obvious defects.
sentences.chinese: 當然，洛倫茨的理論存在明顯的缺陷。
